00048 /**
00049  * @class CallElementTest
00050  * @brief cppunit class for testing call element behavior
00051  */
00052 class CallElementTest : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00053 
00054 {
00055 
00056 private:
00057 
00058   map<string, CallElement*> ceTestCases;
00059 
00060   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(CallElementTest);
00061   CPPUNIT_TEST(operator_equal);
00062   CPPUNIT_TEST(isValidXXXX);
00063   CPPUNIT_TEST(describeVerbose);
00064   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00065 
00066 public:
00067   void setUp();
00068   void operator_equal();
00069   void isValidXXXX();
00070   void describeVerbose();
00071 
00072 };
00073 
00074 void CallElementTest::setUp()
00075 {
00076 
00077 
00078   ceTestCases.insert(pair<string, CallElement*>("equal1", new CallElement("366793", "G")));
00079   ceTestCases.insert(pair<string, CallElement*>("equal2", new CallElement("366793", "G")));
00080   ceTestCases.insert(pair<string, CallElement*>("equal3", new CallElement("366793", "T")));
00081   ceTestCases.insert(pair<string, CallElement*>("equal4", new CallElement("466793", "G")));
00082   ceTestCases.insert(pair<string, CallElement*>("wildcardNC", new CallElement("466793", "NC")));
00083   ceTestCases.insert(pair<string, CallElement*>("wildcardPRA", new CallElement("466793", "PRA")));
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CallElementTest::operator_equal()
00088 {
00089   cout << endl;
00090   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CallElementTest", "operator_equal");
00091   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00092   CallElement *equal1 = ceTestCases["equal1"];
00093   CallElement *equal2 = ceTestCases["equal2"];
00094   CallElement *equal3 = ceTestCases["equal3"];
00095   CallElement *equal4 = ceTestCases["equal4"];
00096   CallElement *wildcardNC = ceTestCases["wildcardNC"];
00097   CallElement *wildcardPRA = ceTestCases["wildcardPRA"];
00098 
00099   // operator==, operator!=
00100   cerr << "a == b: a.m_probeSet == b.m_probeSet, a.m_base == b.m_base...";
00101   CPPUNIT_ASSERT((*equal1) == (*equal2));
00102   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00103 
00104   cerr << "a != b: a.m_probeSet == b.m_probeSet, a.m_base != b.m_base...";
00105   CPPUNIT_ASSERT((*equal1) != (*equal3));
00106   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00107 
00108   cerr << "a != b: a.m_probeSet != b.m_probeSet, a.m_base == b.m_base...";
00109   CPPUNIT_ASSERT((*equal1) != (*equal4));
00110   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00111 
00112   cerr << "a == b, b.m_base = NC: a.m_probeSet == b.m_probeSet, b.m_base = NC...";
00113   CPPUNIT_ASSERT((*equal4) == (*wildcardNC));
00114   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00115 
00116   cerr << "a == b, b.m_base = PRA: a.m_probeSet == b.m_probeSet, b.m_base = PRA...";
00117   CPPUNIT_ASSERT((*equal4) == (*wildcardPRA));
00118   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00119 
00120   cerr << "a != b, b.m_base = PRA: a.m_probeSet != b.m_probeSet, b.m_base = PRA...";
00121   CPPUNIT_ASSERT((*equal1) != (*wildcardPRA));
00122   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00123 
00124 
00125   cerr << endl;
00126   return;
00127 }

00130 void CallElementTest::isValidXXXX()
00131 {
00132 
00133   cout << endl;
00134   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CallElementTest", "isValidXXXX");
00135   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00136   CallElement *valid1 = ceTestCases["equal1"];
00137 
00138   // isProbeSet
00139   cerr << "isValidProbeSet: valid1->isValidProbeSetd(valid1->m_probeSet)...";
00140   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidProbeSet(valid1->m_probeSet));
00141   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00142 
00143   cerr << "isValidProbeSet: !valid1->isValidProbeSetd(\"badProbeSetId\")...";
00144   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!valid1->isValidProbeSet("badProbeSetd"));
00145   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00146 
00147   cerr << "isValidProbeSet: !valid1->isValidProbeSetd(\"03939p\")...";
00148   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!valid1->isValidProbeSet("03939p"));
00149   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00150 
00151   // isValidBaseId
00152   cerr << "isValidBaseId: valid1->isValidBase(valid1->m_base)...";
00153   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidBase(valid1->m_bases[0]));
00154   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00155 
00156   cerr << "isValidBaseId: valid1->isValidBase(\"G\")...";
00157   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidBase("G"));
00158   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00159 
00160   cerr << "isValidBaseId: !valid1->isValidBase(\"g\")...";
00161   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!valid1->isValidBase("g"));
00162   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00163 
00164   cerr << "isValidBaseId: valid1->isValidBase(\"INS\")...";
00165   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidBase("INS"));
00166   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00167 
00168   cerr << "isValidBaseId: valid1->isValidBase(\"DEL\")...";
00169   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidBase("DEL"));
00170   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00171 
00172   cerr << "isValidBaseId: valid1->isValidBase(\"NC\")...";
00173   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidBase("NC"));
00174   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00175 
00176   cerr << "isValidBaseId: valid1->isValidBase(\"PRA\")...";
00177   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(valid1->isValidBase("PRA"));
00178   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00179 
00180   cerr << endl;
00181   return;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void CallElementTest::describeVerbose()
00185 {
00186   cout << endl;
00187   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CallElementTest", "describeVerbose");
00188   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00189 
00190   RunTimeEnvironment rte;
00191 
00192   CallElement *describe1 = ceTestCases["equal1"];
00193 
00194   rte.m_currentVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES ;
00195 
00196   Verbose::setLevel(ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES);
00197 
00198   cerr << "describeVerbose: describe1->describeVerbose(rte)..." << endl;
00199   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(describe1->describeVerbose(rte));
00200   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00201 
00202   cerr << endl;
00203   return;
00204 }

00207 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION(CallElementTest);
